description:
Kaito and Sekito escape from Bukimi and hide at the Yours Truly Company secret base while they wait for Nanten Minami to complete the anti-Resort Virus vaccine.  Ai and Danjirou, brainwashed, appear there and launch an attack! Kaito and Sekito manage to get away thanks to Justice Star, but Kaito begins to show symptoms of turning into a money zombie...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Strongest Tag-team Formation! Kaito and Sekito!!
最強タッグ結成 ￥ カイト&セキト!!
